books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An inexperienced college student falls in love with a tortured man who has particular sexual tastes; the first book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: A hitman who has become a target of the government rescues a teenage girl whose parents have been murdered and who may be at the center of a dangerous conspiracy.
books.name: THE INNOCENT

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A programmer hides from the Russian mob in the Ozarks.
books.name: THE WITNESS

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A Marine returning home sets out to track down the woman whose photo he found in Iraq.
books.name: THE LUCKY ONE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A pitcher beans a promising rookie, ending both careers; years later, the pitcher’s son brings them together.
books.name: CALICO JOE

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The New York lawyer Stone Barrington becomes involved in the family problems of a billionaire hedge fund manager.
books.name: UNNATURAL ACTS

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: Four friends in Monte Carlo for a luxurious girls’ vacation find themselves in prison.
books.name: GUILTY WIVES

books.author: by Iris Johansen
books.description: A Hong Kong woman who works for the C.I.A. searches for a deadly formula while she fights to save her son.
books.name: WHAT DOESN'T KILL YOU

books.author: by Tracey Garvis-Graves
books.description: An English teacher and the teenage boy she has agreed to tutor are stranded on an island when the seaplane taking them to join his family in the Maldives crashes in the Indian Ocean.
books.name: ON THE ISLAND

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The three “Fifty Shades” novels in one bundle.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES TRILOGY

books.author: by Jennifer Probst
books.description: A billionaire who needs a wife offers a one-year marriage in name only to a bookstore owner.
books.name: THE MARRIAGE BARGAIN

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: Volume 3 of the Millennium trilogy, about a Swedish hacker and a journalist.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO KICKED THE HORNET’S NEST
